content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the evolution of critic reviews over time. However, it is common for a show or a film to receive mixed reviews upon its initial release, and reviews may become more positive over time as the work gains a cult following or new appreciation. It is also possible for reviews to become more critical as time passes and societal norms change. Overall, it is best to research specific reviews and their evolution over time for a more accurate understanding.
